name: CreateCustomTicketSource
description:
Create a custom ticket source in Freshservice.

Use this tool to create a custom ticket source within the Freshservice platform. Ideal for when you need to define new ticket origin types beyond the defaults provided.

parameters.name: source_name
parameters.description: Specify the name for the custom ticket source in Freshservice.

parameters.name: source_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the custom ticket source.

parameters.name: source_position_in_list
parameters.description: The position of the custom ticket source in the source list. It determines where this source appears in the list of sources.

value_schema.description: Position of the source value in the source list

parameters.name: created_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the source was created in Freshservice. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the source was created

parameters.name: last_modified_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the custom ticket source was last modified. Expected in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the source was last modified

parameters.name: source_present_by_default
parameters.description: Set to true if the source value is present by default in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: True if the source value is present by default in Freshservice

parameters.name: is_visible_for_selection
parameters.description: True if the source value is visible for selection in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: True if the source value is visible for selection in Freshservice

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position of the source value in the source list

value_schema.description: Position of the source value in the source list

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: True if the source value is present by default in Freshservice

value_schema.description: True if the source value is present by default in Freshservice

parameters.name: visible
parameters.description: True if the source value is visible for selection in Freshservice

value_schema.description: True if the source value is visible for selection in Freshservice

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Timestamp at which the source was created

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the source was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Timestamp at which the source was last modified

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the source was last modified
